ygData.subject: Re: Poisen
ygData.msgSnippet: I have just gotten a sheild called  the chitin shell sheild, it is very very hard to get but it is the best sheild i have seen in the game thus far....it has
ygData.messageBody:
I have just gotten a sheild called the chitin shell sheild, it is very very
hard to get but it is the best sheild i have seen in the game thus far....it
has 15 AC as well as plus 10 to resist poison...plus it only wieghs 4
pounds...to get this sheild you have to travel to the dungeon of Guk located
in innothule swamp....once inside you have to kill a beast called a Giant
heart spider, this spider is about level 18-21 so be prepared...i was with 5
level 16 chars and we took it out...but seeing as how you are level 11 id be
very carefull....
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Kyle Mobley[SMTP:kyle@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 6:52 AM
> To: 'Warriors List'
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Poisen
>
> From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>
>
> Does anyone know if there is an item out there that will raise your
> ability to resist poisen... I am a loley lvl 11 Warrior and it seems
> that I take the worst damage from creatures that can poisen like
> Rattlesnakes and Asps... any advice would be great...
>
>
> Nelix
